message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $8,000 to you. Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. How about $8,500? It's still a great deal for you, and it allows me to make a profit.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm really looking for a deal that's as close to $8,000 as possible. I'm willing to meet you at $8,250, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
